rules.trigger: Product appears in the Manage your compliance (MYC) dashboard with one or more compliance requirements listed
required_evidence: Documents and information specified for the product in the MYC dashboard entry
validation_checks: Entry exists for the product in the MYC dashboard
Seller has uploaded the requested documents and information through MYC

submission_metadata.path: Seller Central -> Performance -> Account Health -> Manage your compliance (MYC)

rules.unknown_reason: Amazon public help does not list specific document types, deadlines or enforcement wording for MYC entries

rules.trigger: Account Health page shows an official request for documentation in the MYC section for a product requiring specific certifications or testing
required_evidence: Documentation requested in the MYC section for the affected product
validation_checks: Account Health page shows the MYC section with a documentation request
Seller has submitted requested documentation causing a case to be generated

submission_metadata.path: Seller Central -> Performance -> Account Health -> MYC section

rules.unknown_reason: Forum post describes existence of requests and case creation but not specific documents, SLA or enforcement wording

rules.trigger: Electrical equipment within the scope of Directive 2014/35/EU is placed or made available on the EU market
required_evidence: EU declaration of conformity stating that the safety objectives of Article 3 and Annex I are fulfilled
EU declaration of conformity following the model structure of Annex IV and containing elements specified in Module A (Annex III)
EU declaration of conformity translated into the language or languages required by the Member State where the equipment is placed or made available
validation_checks: Declaration of conformity exists for the electrical equipment
Declaration states that fulfilment of safety objectives referred to in Article 3 and Annex I has been demonstrated
Declaration follows the model structure in Annex IV and includes elements required by Annex III Module A
Declaration is translated into required Member State language(s)

rules.trigger: Apparatus within the scope of Directive 2014/30/EU is placed or made available on the EU market
required_evidence: EU declaration of conformity stating that the essential requirements of Annex I have been fulfilled
EU declaration of conformity following the model structure of Annex IV and containing elements specified in the relevant modules in Annexes II and III
EU declaration of conformity translated into the language or languages required by the Member State where the apparatus is placed or made available
validation_checks: Declaration of conformity exists for the apparatus
Declaration states that essential requirements in Annex I have been fulfilled
Declaration follows the model structure in Annex IV and includes elements required by Annexes II and III
Declaration is translated into required Member State language(s)
